      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Sound experiments - loudspeaker and candle flame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stichhaltige Experimente - Lautsprecher und 
Kerzeflamme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expériences saines - haut-parleur et flamme de 
bougie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiências sadias - loudspeaker e flama da 
vela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimenti sani - altoparlante e fiamma della 
candela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υγιή πειράματα - φλόγα μεγάφωνων και κεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimentos sanos - altavoz y llama de la vela</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a loudspeaker placed near a burning candle. As sound comes out of the speaker, the flame flickers in the direction indicated by the arrow.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">candle flame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">loudspeaker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound experiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Lautsprecher, der nahe
einer brennenden Kerze plaziert wird. Da Ton aus den 
Lautsprecher herauskommt, flackert die Flamme in der Richtung, die 
durch den Pfeil angezeigt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un haut-parleur placé 
près d'une bougie brûlante. Car le bruit sort du haut-parleur,
la flamme clignote dans la direction indiquée par la flèche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um loudspeaker colocado 
perto de uma vela ardente. Porque o som sai do altofalante, a 
flama cintila no sentido indicado pela seta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un altoparlante 
disposto vicino ad una candela burning. Poichè il suono esce 
dall'altoparlante, la fiamma tremola nel senso indicato dalla freccia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα μεγάφωνο που 
τοποθετείται κοντά σε ένα καίγοντας κερί. Καθώς ο ήχος 
βγαίνει από τον ομιλητή, η φλόγα τρέμει στην κατεύθυνση που 
υποδεικνύεται από το βέλος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un altavoz colocado 
cerca de una vela ardiente. Pues el sonido sale del altavoz, la 
llama oscila en la dirección indicada por la flecha.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kerzeflamme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lautsprecher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stichhaltige Experimente</string>
          </keyword>
